long_description: The Coleman Instaclip(R) mantles feature plastic tabs that make installation quick and easy-no more strings to tie or wires to twist. Mantles fit lantern models 200, 201, 214, 220, 275, 282, 285, 286, 288, 290, 295, 5107, 5114, 5150, 5151, 5152, 5153, 5154, 5155, 5159, 5177, 5178, 9950, 9960. Also compatible with lantern models 2000003048, 2000003049, 2000003050 and 2000003051.
short_description: The Coleman Instaclip(R) mantles feature plastic tabs that make installation quick and easy-no more strings to tie or wires to twist.
